file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Project12-C-Slack-clone API
  description: Project12-C-Slack-clone API
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
  version: 1.0.0-oas3
servers:
  - url: 'http://101.101.218.104:5000'
  - url: 'https://api.slack-clone.kro.kr'
paths:
  /api/workspace:
    get:
      tags:
        - workspace
      summary: select user workspace
      description: select user workspace userID 미들웨어에서 추가
      parameters:
        - name: userID
          in: query
          description: user id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  workspaces:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        _id:
                          type: string
                        name:
                          type: string
                        creator:
                          type: string
          description: success
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
    post:
      tags:
        - workspace
      summary: create new workspace
      description: Create new workspace
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  inviteCode:
                    type: string
                    description: workspace url
                  workspaceId:
                    type: string
          description: success response
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
      parameters:
        - name: userID
          in: query
          description: user id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: workspace name
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: channelName
          in: query
          description: Channel name created by default
          required: false
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
  /api/workspace/invite:
    summary: invite to workspace
    description: invite to workspace
    post:
      tags:
        - workspace
      summary: invite to workspace
      description: invite to workspace
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '201':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  inviteCode:
                    type: string
                    description: invite code
          description: success response
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceID
          in: query
          description: workspace id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: userID
          in: query
          description: user id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
  /api/workspace/invite/{code}:
    summary: invited to workspace
    description: invited to workspace
    get:
      tags:
        - workspace
      summary: invited to workspace
      description: invited to workspace
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '201':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  inviteCode:
                    type: string
                    description: invite code
          description: success response
        '304':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: not modified
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: unauthorized
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
      parameters:
        - name: userID
          in: query
          description: user id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: code
          in: path
          description: invite code
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
  /api/workspace/check-duplicate-name:
    summary: check duplicate workspace name
    description: invitedcheck duplicate workspace name
    get:
      tags:
        - workspace
      summary: check duplicate workspace name
      description: check duplicate workspace name
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  data:
                    type: boolean
                    description: is duplicate
          description: success response
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: query
          description: workspace name
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
  /api/workspace/info/{workspaceId}:
    summary: get workspace, workspace user info
    description: get workspace, workspace user info
    get:
      tags:
        - workspace
      summary: get workspace, workspace user info
      description: get workspace, workspace user info
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceId
          in: path
          description: workspaceId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: userId
          in: query
          description: userId
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  data:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      _id:
                        type: string
                      title:
                        type: string
                      displayName:
                        type: string
                      pause:
                        type: string
                      phoneNumber:
                        type: string
                      timeZone:
                        type: string
                      profileUrl:
                        type: string
                      status:
                        type: string
                      expireStatus:
                        type: string
                      isAdmin:
                        type: boolean
                      isActive:
                        type: boolean
                      worksacpeId:
                        type: string
                      sections:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: string
                      workspaceInfo:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          _id:
                            type: string
                          name:
                            type: string
                          creator:
                            type: string
                          profileUrl:
                            type: string
                          default_channel:
                            type: string
          description: success response
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        '600':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: DB Error

  /api/thread/follow:
    summary: update follow config
    description: follow 설정을 변경한다.
    patch:
      tags:
        - thread
      summary: update follow config
      description: follow 설정을 변경한다.
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceUserInfoId
          in: query
          description: workspaceUserInfoId
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: chatId
          in: query
          description: chatId
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: success response
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
  /api/channel/description:
    summary: update channel description
    description: channel description 변경
    patch:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: update channel description
      description: channel description 변경
      parameters:
        - name: channelId
          in: query
          description: channelId
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: description
          in: query
          description: 변경 될 description
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: success response
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
  /api/channel/topic:
    summary: update channel topic
    description: channel topic 변경
    patch:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: update channel topic
      description: channel topic 변경
      parameters:
        - name: channelId
          in: query
          description: channelId
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: topic
          in: query
          description: 변경 될 topic
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: success
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
  /api/channel/check-duplicate-name:
    summary: check duplicated name
    description: 채널 이름 중복 확인
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: check duplicated name
      description: 채널 이름 중복 확인
      parameters:
        - name: title
          in: query
          description: 확인 할 채널 이름
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: workspaceId
          in: query
          description: 워크스페이스 id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  data:
                    type: boolean
          description: success
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  message:
                    type: string
          description: bad request
        '600':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  message:
                    type: string
          description: DB Error
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
  /api/channel:
    summary: create channel
    description: channel 생성
    post:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: create channel
      description: channel 생성
      parameters:
        - name: title
          in: query
          description: channel title
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: creator
          in: query
          description: channel creator, middleware로 userId 전달
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: description
          in: query
          description: channel description
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: workspaceId
          in: query
          description: workspace Id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: channelType
          in: query
          description: channel type, (private = 0, public = 1, DM = 2)
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  channelId:
                    type: integer
                    description: channelId
          description: success response

        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request
        default:
          description: Default error sample response
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: get channel list
      description: get channel list
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceUserInfoId
          in: query
          description: workspaceUserInfo id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  result:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        _id:
                          type: object
                        channelId:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            _id:
                              type: object
                            title:
                              type: string
                            description:
                              type: string
                            topic:
                              type: string
                            channelType:
                              type: integer
                            creator:
                              type: object
                            isDeleted:
                              type: boolean
                            createdAt:
                              format: date-time
                              type: string
                            updatedAt:
                              format: date-time
                              type: string
                            member:
                              type: array
                              items:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  workspaceUserInfoId:
                                    type: object
                                  displayName:
                                    type: string
                                  profileUrl:
                                    type: string
                                  isActive:
                                    type: boolean
                        sectionName:
                          type: string
                        readChatId:
                          type: string
                        isMute:
                          type: boolean
                        notification:
                          type: number
                        createdAt:
                          format: date-time
                          type: string
                        updatedAt:
                          format: date-time
                          type: string
          description: success response
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request

  /api/user/sign-in/github:
    summary: workspace user login
    description: selectworkspace user login
    post:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: workspace user login
      description: workspace user login
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: oauthId
          in: query
          description: workspace user id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: signin success
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  /api/user/sign-out:
    summary: workspace user signout
    description: selectworkspace user signout
    delete:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: workspace user signout
      description: workspace user signout
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceUserInfoId
          in: query
          description: workspace user id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter
  /api/user/sign-in/google:
    summary: google login
    description: google login
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: google login
      description: google login
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: google login

  /api/user/sign-in/google/callback:
    summary: google login callback
    description: google login callback
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: google login
      description: google login
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  redirectUrl:
                    type: string
          description: google login callback

  /api/channel/{channelId}/info:
    summary: get channel info for channel header// private=0, public=1, DM=2
    description: get channel info for channel header// private=0, public=1, DM=2
    get:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: get channel info for channel header// private=0, public=1, DM=2
      description: get channel info for channel header// private=0, public=1, DM=2
      parameters:
        - name: channelId
          in: path
          description: channel id
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  result:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      _id:
                        type: string
                      channelId:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          _id:
                            type: string
                          title:
                            type: string
                          description:
                            type: string
                          topic:
                            type: string
                          channelType:
                            type: integer
                          creator:
                            type: string
                          isDeleted:
                            type: boolean
                          createdAt:
                            format: date-time
                            type: string
                          updatedAt:
                            format: date-time
                            type: string
                      member:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            _id:
                              type: string
                            fullName:
                              type: string
                            displayName:
                              type: string
                            profileUrl:
                              type: string
                            isActive:
                              type: boolean
                            userId:
                              type: string
                      sectionName:
                        type: string
                      readChatId:
                        type: string
                      isMute:
                        type: boolean
                      notification:
                        type: number
                      createdAt:
                        format: date-time
                        type: string
                      updatedAt:
                        format: date-time
                        type: string
                      workspaceUserInfoId:
                        type: object
                      pinnedCount:
                        type: number
          description: get channel info for channel header
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: bad request

  /api/channel/invite:
    summary: invite user to channel
    description: invite user to channel
    post:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: invite user to channel
      description: invite user to channel
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceUserInfoId
          in: query
          description: workspaceUserInfo id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: object
              properties:
                workspaceUserInfoId:
                  type: string
        - name: channelId
          in: query
          description: channelId id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: invite user to channel

  /api/channel/mute:
    summary: update channel mute option
    description: update channel mute option
    patch:
      tags:
        - channel
      summary: update channel mute option
      description: update channel mute option
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: workspaceUserInfoId
          in: query
          description: workspaceUserInfo id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: channelId
          in: query
          description: channel id
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: update channel mute option

  /api/search/userId:
    summary: search user for inviting
    description: search user for inviting
    post:
      tags:
        - search
      summary: search user for inviting
      description: search user for inviting
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: keyword
          in: query
          description: keyword
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: workspaceId
          in: query
          description: workspaceId
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: channelId
          in: query
          description: channelId
          required: true
          style: form
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  result:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        _id:
                          type: string
                        fullName:
                          type: string
                        displayName:
                          type: string
                        profileUrl:
                          type: string
                        isActive:
                          type: boolean
          description: search user for inviting
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
          description: not modified

  /api/direct-message:
    summary: get users last dm
    description: get users last dm
    get:
      tags:
        - direct message
      summary: get users last dm
      description: get users last dm
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  result:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        channel:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            channelId:
                              type: string
                            channelTitle:
                              type: string
                        user:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            workspaceUserInfoId:
                              type: string
                            displayName:
                              type: string
                            profileUrl:
                              type: string
                        contents:
                          type: string
                        createdAt:
                          format: date-time
                          type: string
          description: get users last dm

  /api/mention-reaction:
    summary: get user mention and reaction
    description: get user mention and reaction
    get:
      tags:
        - mention & reaction
      summary: get user mention and reaction
      description: get user mention and reaction
      operationId: ''
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  result:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        chat:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            chatId:
                              type: string
                            creatorId:
                              type: string
                            creatorDisplayName:
                              type: string
                            contents:
                              type: string
                            createdAt:
                              format: date-time
                              type: string
                        reaction:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              workspaceUserInfoId:
                                type: string
                              displayName:
                                type: string
                              profileUrl:
                                type: string
                              emotion:
                                type: string
                              createdAt:
                                format: date-time
                                type: string
                        channel:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            channelId:
                              type: string
                            channelType:
                              type: number
                            channelName:
                              type: string
                        actionType:
                          type: number

          description: get user mention and reaction

  '/api/chat/{workspaceId}/{channelId}':
    summary: get chat messages
    description: get chat messages
    get:
      tags:
        - chat
      operationId: ''
      parameters:
        - name: channelId
          in: path
          description: channelId
          required: true
          explode: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: fromDate
          in: query
          description: 날짜 이후의 message get
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: currentCursor
          in: query
          description: 마지막 chat의 createAt 날짜보다 이전 message get
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  success:
                    type: boolean
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        _id:
                          type: string
                        pinned:
                          type: string
                        contents:
                          type: string
                        channel:
                          type: string
                        creator:
                          type: string
                        parentId:
                          type: string
                        isDelete:
                          type: boolean
                        createdAt:
                          format: date-time
                          type: string
                        updatedAt:
                          format: date-time
                          type: string
                        reply:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              _id:
                                type: string
                              creator:
                                type: string
                              createdAt:
                                format: date-time
                                type: string
                              userInfo:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  _id:
                                    type: string
                                  displayName:
                                    type: string
                                  profileUrl:
                                    type: string
                        userInfo:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            _id:
                              type: string
                            displayName:

components:
  schemas:
    workspaceUserInfo:
      type: 'object'
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        title:
          type: string
        fullName:
          type: string
        displayName:
          type: string
        pause:
          type: string
        phoneNumber:
          type: integer
        timeZone:
          type: string
        profileUrl:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        expireStatus:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        isAdmin:
          type: boolean
        isActive:
          type: boolean
        userId:
          type: string
        workspaceId:
          type: string

    workspace:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        creator:
          type: string
        profileUrl:
          type: string

    user:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        OAuthId:
          type: string
        fullName:
          type: string
        isDeleted:
          type: boolean

    channelConfig:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        workspaceUserInfoId:
          type: string
        channelId:
          type: string
        readChatId:
          type: string
        isMute:
          type: string
        norification:
          type: string
        sectionId:
          type: string

    follow:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        workspaceUserInfoId:
          type: string
        chatId:
          type: string

    section:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        workspaceUserInfoId:
          type: string

    channel:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        title:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        creator:
          type: string
        topic:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        channelType:
          type: number
        isDelete:
          type: boolean

    chat:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        pinned:
          type: boolean
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        editedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        contents:
          type: string
        channel:
          type: string
        creator:
          type: string
        parentId:
          type: string
        isDelete:
          type: boolean

    file:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        path:
          type: string
        fileType:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        creator:
          type: string

    reaction:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        emotion:
          type: string
        workspaceUserInfoId:
          type: string
        chatId:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time

    userHistory:
      type: object
      properties:
        _id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        userId:
          type: string
        workspaceId:
          type: string
        path:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
